sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtntmplatinfo ( tmplat_id , tmplat_nm , tmplat_cours , use_at , tmplat_se_code , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #tmplatId# , #tmplatNm# , #tmplatCours# , #useAt# , #tmplatSeCode# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtntmplatinfo SET tmplat_id = #tmplatId# , tmplat_nm = #tmplatNm# , tmplat_cours = #tmplatCours# , use_at = #useAt# , tmplat_se_code = #tmplatSeCode# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND tmplat_id = #tmplatId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtntmplatinfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND tmplat_id = #tmplatId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT tmplat_id , tmplat_nm , tmplat_cours , use_at , tmplat_se_code , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtntmplatinfo WHERE tmplat_id = #tmplatId#

SELECT tmplat_id , tmplat_nm , tmplat_cours , use_at , tmplat_se_code , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtntmplatinfo WHERE 1=1
tmplat_id = #searchKeyword#
tmplat_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY tmplat_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtntmplatinfo WHERE 1=1
tmplat_id = #searchKeyword#
tmplat_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
